title: Information Security Analyst
description: We are looking for an Information Security Analyst to safeguard our organization's digital assets. You will be responsible for monitoring for security breaches, conducting vulnerability assessments, and implementing defensive measures. Your role includes performing penetration tests, managing firewall and encryption systems, and developing security policies. You should have a deep understanding of network protocols, operating system security, and common attack vectors. Familiarity with compliance standards like SOC2 or GDPR is a plus. We value analytical thinking, detail orientation, and the ability to respond quickly and effectively to security incidents.
